title: The Tango
description: Weeks passed without hearing from Rhys; then I received a text that shook me to my core.The Barracks. One hour. REDI lied, he’s angry, and I’m about to pay for my lie with a pound of flesh. RED.I wasn’t supposed to fall for him. He blurred the lines and I stepped right over. Now I was facing his wrath, and my undeniable feelings for him. I had to find a way to make things right.RED.Rhys felt threatened by my secret, but little did I know, he was hiding one of his own.FILTHY EROTIC ROMANCE.***FILTHY EROTIC ROMANCE. For Mature Audiences only. Extremely Explicit Sex. Strong Language.This is book two of a four part serial.
author: Angelica Chase
